website_summaries.verdict: Some owners say this unit provides chiropractor-grade relief.
pros: LCD display allows you to monitor your session
Targeted high-intensity nerve stimulation helps erase pain
cons: Fewer settings available than some other options

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive TENS, really works
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Pure Pulse device as a means of alternative pain relief. I have fibromyalgia, as well as rotator cuff tendinitis and wanted something that wasn’t a pill. I had purchased the Pure Enrichment heating pad for a relative and they really liked the quality so when I saw a well priced and portable TENS unit, I decided to try it. I have used it primarily on my shoulders and legs. It works! I like that there are specific programs and that I can adjust the intensity. The adhesive pads do not irritate and keep their stickiness. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: K. Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Shocking results.....
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to buy one of these TENS units but found this one on Prime Day as a lighting deal....boy was i glad i got it. Been using the IcyHot brand TENS unit for a while....although it works its just not strong enough and no control of it, just on/off. Well this one has plenty of settings and can work on 2 areas at the same time instead of one. Several different pulse settings and is very strong....only comes with 4 pads but plan on placing an order soon to get additional pads.....Satisfied with the purchase at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Why does it sting?
customer_reviews.text: I want to give it more stars but I opened it yesterday and tried a couple times and all I feel is stinging, even on level 1. I can even feel the stinging after I take it off, almost like in itch. I wonder if I'm using it wrong, my electrodes are sticky and aren't touching each other. I want to like this product but it's not a pleasant feeling at all. I bought some conductive gel so I will try that later. I was able to get a nice massage that didn't feel like licking a battery once so I kind of know what it's supposed to feel like
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: great but pads are expensive
customer_reviews.text: First time using an electrical pulse device instead of more traditional massagers. It definitely worked because I fell asleep from relaxation just as I usually do with physical manipulation of muscles. But the pads did wear out more quickly than other reviews suggest, and replacements are expensive. I tried other cheaper replacement pads that were advertised as universally compatible, but they did not function with this device.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: It's like being plugged into your own masseuse!
customer_reviews.text: For ongoing nagging pain this was recommended to me from a co-worker who has a husband that does construction/constantly standing. For anyone who is on their feet all day and need ten minutes of paradise consider this! The machine comes with 4 sticky pads to reuse up to 30x each. You can get a very intense massage or something like a kitten walking across your back, I love the range this machine offers! I did buy the 20 pack of additional sticky pads so I have a fresh one when needed.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: The best $ I've ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Just two pieces of advice: Avoid repositioning the pads while the thing is turned on - fingertips are much too sensitive for contact with the "live" side of the pad. Also, if you feel a stinging sensation on your skin, it means that the pads aren't making proper contact. In that case simply reapply or add a tiny amount of conductive gel, or apply light pressure with your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: This allows me to reduce pain without physical therapy so that I can keep the back pain from getting really bad. Haven't needed
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical. But having been to physical therapy multiple times for 2+ months each time, wanted to try something new. This allows me to reduce pain without physical therapy so that I can keep the back pain from getting really bad. Haven't needed to go to the physical therapist in over a year since I've had this. Don't know how or why it works but, after over 10 years of back pain, I'm finally pain free most days. And, when I'm not, I quickly wear my tensing unit.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Batteries provided leaked after 2 uses; pads don't re-adhere well
customer_reviews.text: The unit works well. BUT after only 2 uses, the batteries provided leaked, ruining the unit compartment. And when went to change, splashed that leaking battery water/acid onto skin. Also the pads provided say would be good for up to 30 uses--- well after 2 the adherant stickiness is gone (and I am placing on haired regions). Unit works well but the pads and batteries that came with mine make it unusable after 2 tries. Hoping to get replacement. UPDATE: Contacted seller. They were immediately responsive; they shipped me an entire new unit---they didn't know what was up with the unit I had--but wanted to make sure we were taken care of. CUSTOMER SERVICE AS IT SHOULD BE!!! Wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Prior to purchase I had to go to doctor to get this treatment. Hmm LOVE IT and for so little cost it gave amazing results. I gave 5 stars because it works and no dang achy pain as I sit here typing this review. I'm no doctor, but this works with easy controls and if you are having 2nd thoughts about it due to low price you will miss out on a great unit.
customer_reviews.author: RJM

customer_reviews.title: Love the unit and GREAT customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We loved the unit when we got it early this year, but it died on us a few months in. We tried replacing the batteries, but that didn't help. We called Pure Enrichment and their customer service was wonderful! John was very patient and helpful. He was apologetic about the unit failing and sent us a new one with no problems!! We're so excited for our new unit to come in so we can work out our muscles!! I couldn't be happier with Pure Enrichment!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and compact
customer_reviews.text: My Tens Unit just arrived today. I have lower disc degeneration in my back and this will work wonders between chiropractic treatments. I have already done a 15 minute session and I can't go above a 2 on the settings! This is way more powerful than I thought it would be. So far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: NatureGirl

customer_reviews.title: OMG, actual pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple chronic pain issues. Some were caused by chemo that I had 20 years ago and the other from injuries in my shoulder, knee and back. I haven't slept for more than two or three hours at a time in about ten years. I have only used it twice but both times I had solid sleep for more than six hours both nights. For me this is life changing. The instructions were easy to follow and obviously for me the results were fantastic. I would highly recommend giving it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Grynnie

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit for back pain relief. I do not have chronic back pain, but sustained what I think was a severe muscle stain in my lower back and was significantly disabled for a few days and continued to have some pain for a couple of weeks. It gave temporary pain relief, and I liked the way it alternated with different types of sensations such as massage, kneading and beating on the muscles. After a couple of weeks my back got well, and I don't currently need to use it for pain. However, when my back muscles are tired I use it because it feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Laura in KC

customer_reviews.title: Simple and highly beneficial at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Mainly used for upper back massage and left elbow. I have tendinitis in my left elbow and when I use the "joint" selection, it hits the spot really well. Be sure to use it when you are not experiencing pain. I believe if the ligament has inflammation it will aggravate it more. The back massage is really helpful before going to sleep. It calms the neck area down. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Dwight A. Kaneshiro

customer_reviews.title: Very happy for that price!
customer_reviews.text: I have an older version that was just plain worn out but I had spent a lot of $ on it, this made me nervous what the quality would be for this price. I love this & all the settings! I will be ordering more pads for it as those will be needed with so much use. 3 settings, speed control, suggested settings at the click of a button. ..for both sides. Easy to use & understand.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara A.

customer_reviews.title: It's Working Great
customer_reviews.text: This isn't quite as powerful as the one I already have (that isn't 4 pulse points, just two), but it still works really well and eases the tension. My family and I are strong advocates of any TENS-related machine, and this can easily compare to the one we have. Although, I wish it'd be a bit stronger at points, but I like how it's easily workable and can fit anyone with any setting.
customer_reviews.author: zoe

customer_reviews.title: I happy that I decided on this one
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried other muscle stimulators but this one seems to work the best. I suffer from tennis elbow and this product helps so much. The inflammation subsides after the session. Great to use if you have inflammation, nerve pain, etc. Pros: -Easy to use and carry around -Different modes for each body area -Different levels of intensity -Therapeutic/relaxing -Can use as often as you want Cons: -You can't pause your session. You would have to start it over -Dosent come with extra pair of pads (some normally do but thats ok)
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Carter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I injured my lower back. The pain was excruciating. My doctor advised 5 things- Prednisone, which didn’t help at all. Reflexeril, which I could only take at night because it made me drowsy. Rest the first 24 hrs, with alternating ice & heat. Movement beginning the second 24 hrs, beginning with gentle stretching. Lastly she recommended I buy a TENS unit. I looked at all the top reviews on Amazon & selected Pure I was totally skeptical, and desperate. I decided to give it a shot. It was amazing. I got relief immediately. I’m now using it regularly to help me get through the day at the office, sitting down. It’s an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Licourt Bird

customer_reviews.title: Choose this one
customer_reviews.text: I came to know about this item on a comic convention. They actually had a similar product selling for $100. I thought it was too much. So I decided to go to amazon and check similar products. The price is great. The actual item Pros: has 2 separate settings so you can put different setting at same time, light, cons: you need to replace battery , you would need to replace pads after awhile, over all i would say if youre just wanting to try a product like this choose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jmo

customer_reviews.title: A Good Substitute Between Chiropractor Visits
customer_reviews.text: I was very interested in this product, as my chiropractor uses something similar in his office. Although his is a much larger, most likely professional system, I must admit that I was pleasantly impressed with this small unit from PurePulse. I didn't start using it until this morning, as shoveling snow causes my feet and back to ache. I have ongoing pain issues with my lower back and my feet. As a flight attendant, I am very active but it does tend to aggravate these issues. I like this unit because I can travel with it. It is nice to find a portable unit I can use on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Christi J

customer_reviews.title: The unit works good and provided relief to my knees but the manual ...
customer_reviews.text: The unit works good and provided relief to my knees but the manual was very difficult to read due to printing problems " lack of dark ink letters" 4 stars for unit , 2 stars for manual/instructions. Needs a larger 3 by 3 pad if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the worst TENS unit I've ever tried. The buttons are incongruous and confusing, but worst of all the default timer is only 15 minutes and cannot be changed. What a total waste of time and money. Spend the extra $10 for a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Bitofinger

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable ems/tens
customer_reviews.text: Works better than I expected considering the price of the unit. It's a great value. I've used the massage and knead settings several times and find them both to be effective for relaxation and general muscle tension. Took off one star for the fact that the timer only allows for 15 minutes. A belt clip would be nice, also. I ordered additional pads in a larger size and they were also better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: nativepeach

customer_reviews.title: Pure Pulse Tens - A true blessing!
customer_reviews.text: Kathleen Macaulay Jun 28, 2020, 8:32 AM PDT Sent from Mail for Windows 10 I am responding to your feedback request on my new Pure Pulse Tens Electronic Pulse Stimulator. I had knee surgery in March followed by physical therapy where I first experienced a TENS Unit. After I realized the benefits of using this I ordered one from Amazon. I love the unit. It is GREAT! I have returned to work and often come home in pain, 15 minutes on the units helps relax my knee and makes walking bearable again. It really is a blessing and I would recommend it to everyone struggling with joint issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Macaulay

customer_reviews.title: I needed this product!
customer_reviews.text: I was involved in a four car accident in 2004 in which my pickup was struck by two different vehicles and I suffered injuries to my neck and back causing me very bad neck strain and back pain from when the seat belt pulled after the impacts. Actually, the driver side door of my pickup had to be cut out by firemen to get me out . This product really helps me with my pain which I still have continuously. It is a great product for the money I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Delia Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: For me, does help with lower back and wrist pain
customer_reviews.text: I originally boought this device to try to help alleviate elbow and wrist pain related to my carpal tunnel syndrome issues and for lower back pain. And for the few times I used it, it did start to see some improvements. Unnnn-fortunately, my dear wifey tried it on her sore shoulder one night and I haven't gotten it back since! Time to order one for myself. The only additional function I wish this device had would have been a backlit screen to make it easier to use at night.
customer_reviews.author: T. E. Kainz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, portable, & is effective.
customer_reviews.text: I only use it occasionally; and mainly to relieve arm muscle and joint pain. I rate this product's quality at a 5 because it is convenient, portable using batteries, easy to understand how to use it, and is still operational since purchasing in 2017, and, of course, is effective in somewhat relieving the pain. My use is mainly therapeutic. I enjoy the comfortable feeling of the electronic pulses, and there's several variations and power intensity to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Very effective, portable, and simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Stimulator for awkward and hard to reach neck and shoulder discomfort daily pain. Even though the reviews were high I was quite skeptical. But I must say it is exactly what it advertises. It has helped me relieve tense areas of my neck and shoulder. It is simple to use. I can take it places easily. I find it very effective for its purposes. My only complaint would be the adhesive. The pads are not great at staying in place and do wear out. Nevertheless, I have recommended this purchase to friends, who are also pleased with their results.
customer_reviews.author: ERPublishing

customer_reviews.title: Skin Irritation.
customer_reviews.text: Even on lowest setting causes skin irritation. Powered off, then let pads sit - no irritation. Ran on level 1 - irritation after 10-15 mins. Really odd as I never had an issue at Chiro "ever" with these devices.....not sure what's up with this products performance. Was hoping to save some money going this route. Sadly this device is not eligible for a return ;(
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: Better results then I could have hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: WOW I'm so glad I purchased this tens unit. I received it yesterday used it last night on different sore muscles in my neck and shoulders. Last night was the first night in three weeks I didn't wake up in the middle of the night with intense neck pain. After using the tens unit one time my neck is 90% better. I used the auto setting for the shoulder, found my intensity number. Piece of cake to use.
customer_reviews.author: TOD N.

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive massager
customer_reviews.text: I've used similar products in the past. We'll have to see how well the electrode pads hold up over time, but after several uses the PurePulse works even better than advertised. It's more powerful than expected for AA battery operation, the leads attach and remove easily, and the settings are easy to operate. I deal with neck, shoulder, and lower back pain, and it helps significantly with all three. (The kneading setting is most effective.) It's a decent buy at the $39.99 Amazon price, but at the (frequent) sale prices $15-$20 less it's an excellent deal.
customer_reviews.author: dsbsh

customer_reviews.title: Great Massager
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Massager, I almost bought another brand and glad I paid attention to all the good reviews this unit got, it has plenty of settings and can be adjusted easily, all the buttons and dials are labeled in ENGLISH you can't imagine how nice it is to know exactly what your doing with it right out of the box with no learning curve involved. Best of all you can buy the cheapest electrodes on the market because it doesn't use the expensive snap connectors. This may be the best and cheapest thing I've bought recently on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: appoloosa

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of the month!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for two days for a back pain and post workout relaxation. I mean, this thing is fantastic! I can massage two areas at the same time and adjust the force I want to use, so that each location isn't overwhelmed by the energy. Even with just a quick 5 minute session relaxes the tense muscles! For the back, I like using the joint function (personal opinion, not medical advice) because the kneading sensation seems to untie a knot or two.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Chiu

customer_reviews.title: Pulse Massager is great to have when you need relief
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase of the year! This unit has helped with many a cramp! Talk about relaxing sore, aching or stiff muscles! I have used this so much, I may order another one for other members of my household. It's relaxing and works really well to relieve pain. I have had problems sleeping due to stiff or aching back, well this unit addresses that. I usually set it on the massager as I don't like the pulse setting too much. But, other members of my home enjoy the pulse more. In either case, after one 20 minute session, I'm good to go. I recommend this product for anyone who has stiffness or minor back pain. It'll work great for you!!
customer_reviews.author: Lady DA

customer_reviews.title: Works well and more economical than other options
customer_reviews.text: Device works very well. My only "complaint" is that the pads don't last very long, even taking care of them. They lose their stickiness after a handful of uses. I know their replaceable, but I would have hoped to gotten a little more life out of them before have to buy more. Device itself is easy to control and provides decent flexibility to meet your needs. Definitely a great, more economical option than some of the others out there.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzo24

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, looking forward to continuing to use it.
customer_reviews.text: Quite nice; somewhat MORE solid than the one that i used at actual PT; the pads provided are very nice, too. Another improvement over the one that my PT place had-- longer electrode wires, for ease of use. Happy with the purchase, nice price. Since I'm a middle aged sportsman, I expect I'll be using this aplenty. I wish there were some sort of case that it came in, is the only thing. I'll find something to keep all the electrodes and cables together, though.
customer_reviews.author: N. Choe

customer_reviews.title: The different "routines" it has are really nice; however
customer_reviews.text: As powerful as the unit at the chiropractors and PT locations I've been to. The different "routines" it has are really nice; however, I wish it just had a "constant on" function. I've had it ramped up to 7 on my lower back. A nice penetrating current, that still doesn't cause spasm. Hopefully, now that I can do this daily, maybe it will relieve some pain :). Definitely worth the money. They have this as a "Pro" unit also for $59. Glad I found this one, because the only difference is some added youtube videos for back stretches or something.
customer_reviews.author: M. Segal

customer_reviews.title: Bottom of the Barrel
customer_reviews.text: This unit gets the job done but the controls are clunky and the pads that come with it are not the best quality. I would spend the extra $20-$30 for a better unit such as  . The power controls on this unit go in opposite directions and are controlled via a little grooved wheel, this means that it's possible to accidentally bump up or down the power while holding or picking up the unit. The options for massage settings are lacking but I suppose you can't expect much for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jobarda

customer_reviews.title: Great for lumbar spine arthritis
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have arthritis in my lumbar spine and I had to go to physical therapy 3 times a week, but it was difficult to find the time because I'm a mom of a toddler. They did a similar treatment on me and it seemed to help a lot, but it was so time consuming that I began to look for an at-home machine. To my surprise, I found this machine that was very affordable, and when I tried it out at home, it was just as good as the one at the hospital. I highly recommend it to anyone who needs pain relief for spinal issues.
customer_reviews.author: Psprouse

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Effective unit
customer_reviews.text: This unit is a good unit to have. It is powerful and easy to use...and you may purchase more pads easily and affordable. Customer Service was above and beyond my expectations, which is very rare in today's world. Thank You Pure Enrichment for having superior Customer Service, following up with my questions and checking my satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: holly jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly strong for the size and super easy to use. I'm still not convinced on the pain relief aspect but that's all TENs units, not this one in particular. I find it's helpful when you're in a lot of pain for at least temporary relief while the machine is in use.
customer_reviews.author: Becky M

customer_reviews.title: You won't be sorry
customer_reviews.text: If you suffer from constipation, places on your abdomen for the recommended time and I guarantee you it will solve your problems! This is great for muscle tightness anywhere on your body
customer_reviews.author: MsNellieRN

customer_reviews.title: Electroshock
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the PurePulse Electronic Pulse Massager. I am using it on my overworked back and shoulders. Not only has it been pain relieving, it is (to me) painless. Easy to setup and use. I give this product a 5 (highest rating I assume) based on price, ease of use, and quality.
customer_reviews.author: sweet7reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased this unit
customer_reviews.text: I've used this unit two times, but it certainly eased the tension in my neck and lower back. I did use it a little too long, and had it set on 5, on my lower back the second time and had some pain from that but it didn't last. Note to self: 15 min. is long enough and 5 may be a little too high for the first time using it. I really am glad that I have this and look forward to getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Electrodes are pretty worthless
customer_reviews.text: I am not impressed with this item. The electrode pads are incredibly sticky when you first peel them off but they lose it after just a couple of uses. I always placed them back on the plastic sheet they come on after I used them but it did not help. After the first couple of uses they hardly stick to your skin which results in the electric current hitting your skin instead of going through it, which is pretty painful. I do not enjoy practically being electrocuted by this product so I will probably be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Anyone dealing with muscle tension and pain in their neck would benefit greatly by treating themselves with one of
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after borrowing a similar unit from my sister. I discovered a unique relief from chronic muscle tension and set out to find one of my own. I am very pleased with my choice; it is very effective and has a great variety of settings, which allows me to personalize my treatments. I use different settings for different parts of my body, and I increase or decrease the intensity depending on how good or bad I feel. I have already recommended this to several people and think anyone dealing with severe muscle tension and pain in their neck would benefit greatly by treating themselves with one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Ljdecho

customer_reviews.title: It works now
customer_reviews.text: Although it does now work, the batteries it came with initially leaked and needed to be replaced immediately for the unit to be operational. I have difficulty getting all four pads to have a uniform pulse even when they are set the same on the dial. It seems rather antiquated on the keypad and I'm not certain that I'm actually getting different functions from the different keys. Finally, it would be nice if it had a clip on it so that I could clip it to my waist band and not be bound to hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Lenise

customer_reviews.title: This has been an excellent pain reliever
customer_reviews.text: I received this from my wife as a Father's Day present. I have chronic back pain. This has been an excellent pain reliever. Some of the settings don't necessarily thump me hard enough, but there are many different settings that work as well as my physical therapy center. I would recommend this product. Make sure you purchase the proper electrode pads that match is product.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, Consistent, Effective
customer_reviews.text: My sister recommended this product because she said it was the very best, and she was right! When I first bought it and tried it, I was amazed by how effective it was at helping my sore and tired muscles. I use it everywhere there is a sore muscle, and I could not be happier with how it performs!
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use TENS machine
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I have lower back pain occasionally and my chiropractor uses a TENS machine in their office. I was wanting one for myself to help relive the pain. Easy to use and helped eased the pain
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great little portable unit
customer_reviews.text: Great little unit. I have only used it a few times and I really like it. The price was right and it feels just like the one my physical therapist used on me in the clinic. Love the automatic settings and timer. I would definitely recommend this to friends. I got this unit on sale for 19.99 but I would have paid more.
customer_reviews.author: Pagnardc

customer_reviews.title: Too many cords
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this TENS machine at all. There are far too many cords. They get tangled a lot. It's hard to figure out which one is working. By the time you fit them into position, you discover that the plug is in the wrong place.
customer_reviews.author: LovetoRead Book Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for 2 months then died.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this unit, it worked great to relieve low back pain when nothing else would. Unfortunately the left half of the unit quit sending a electric signal two months in. I switched batteries, pads, and finally switched the pulse cords. The right side works regardless of the pulse cord, the left side is just dead. I'd give this a 5 star rating but 2 months of being usable isn't 5 stars. The units fairly cheap, and cheaper if you can find it on sale. But keep in mine it might only be 2 months of life
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyhey girl

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I use it to help relieve muscle pain/tightness in my shoulders. So happy to have found this on Amazon, I lost my previous one!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: This works well for an old man's pains.
customer_reviews.text: I use my unit daily. Works fine. My problem is, I cannot locate replacement wires for the electrodes as one set is useless now ( after three years). Any help in locating replacements will be greatly appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Lee hart

customer_reviews.title: Really surprised me!! in a good way
customer_reviews.text: I really love this item, I have used it a few times since recieiving it, and have very positive things to say about this unit. The power is a lot stronger than I had expected, and really does the job well. My Husband has a problem shoulder and I let him use it when we first got it, he loved it. It helped him take the pain away, and he was really happy that we purchased it. To be honest I was not expecting a lot from, but I was very pleasantly surprised. This will be my "go to" massager, thanks for making a great machine for a great price that truly works.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 7 months
customer_reviews.text: At first it worked fine with moderate & a litter higher stimulation. I like it high. About 3 months ago it started to weaken. I purchased new pads.. No affect. Changed batteries. Now it barely stimulates. Lasted 7 months. I do not use that often. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: nice price
customer_reviews.text: Just like my Chiropractor uses this is amazing for my lower back pain! I just wish it had a continuous stream of electrodes but it definitely beats waiting on the Chiropractor to call me back. I use this every time my lower back starts acting up.....easy to setup and use and GREAT product for the monies
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Gaither

customer_reviews.title: Popular with the family
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this product a year or two ago and just recently bought another for my mom, cause she tried mine and loved it, worked well for her lower back. It is amazing and still holding strong, of course, you will go through the sticky pads which is expected, but they last quite few time before needing to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: McLovinMyLife

customer_reviews.title: The PERFECT massager!
customer_reviews.text: This honestly is a FANTASTIC device! Simplistic and easy to use and to pick up on. PLENTY of power behind it and good pads. I use it a lot for my shoulders and my lower back. Just used it after exercising at a rock climbing gym and it really breaks the muscles down and helps you relax. I'm definitely happy with this and the price was fantastic! Thank you for a great product and a great experience!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Heuler

customer_reviews.title: Great price, does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great find for that price! I love how it has two outlets, that translates into 4 different pads, that can be placed in different places at the same time. I also like the feature of having different presets to treat different body areas. Totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Raul Castro

customer_reviews.title: Works for Endometriosis!
customer_reviews.text: Finally some sort of relief for endometriosis! It does not completely take away the pain (the only thing that does that is morphine), but it helps by interrupting the pain signal to your brain and gives your something else to focus on and/or distract you during the worst of the pain. You can use it in combination with a heating pad, too. It's come in handy for various sore muscles as well, but did not work on my cubical tunnel syndrome, which I was not really expecting because that is nerve related, not muscle. Well worth a try if you have endometriosis.
customer_reviews.author: Lizze Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Buy It
customer_reviews.text: Was at a convention where vendor tried to sell similar product for "special" price $400 on sale from $500! Back at hotel I found this for under $30! This is incredible. The wife and I take turns. Keep the pads moistened for better contact after several uses. We love this unit. I ordered the two bottles of gel and 40 pack of extra pads cheap on Amazon. I'm currently on the deck using the back knead and it feels better than $100 massage. Powerful yet the four aaa batteries are still working. Amazing for how powerful it feels.
customer_reviews.author: NorgeTop Contributor: Karate

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I say "almost" because there's one design modification needed. The power intensity wheels rotate too easily. Each numerical setting should click so that when set they stay set for the duration if you choose to place the control unit in your pocket for mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Marty3

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting one of these since my physical therapist used hers on my back. Works way better then any pill the doctor gives me. So when I saw this great lightening deal on amazon the other day I jumped on it. For the price I am thrilled with the product. I wish there was a constant setting instead of the on and off. But I will not complain also the fact it is portable and I can use it in the car on road trips this might actually save me.
customer_reviews.author: joannaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I really would recommend to anybody to purchase this massager for any pain ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for pain in my neck and shoulder area for about a month. I can say that the pulse massager has helped me reducing the pain and relaxing the muscles around my neck and shoulders. Right now, I don't experience the high discomfort and pain that I had before I started using the massager. I really would recommend to anybody to purchase this massager for any pain and muscle related issues. Also the good thing is that this system come with six different programs for waist, shoulder, joints, hand and legs, and sole depending where you are experiencing discomfort and muscle pain. I highly recommend this system
customer_reviews.author: MARKS

customer_reviews.title: Really one of my favorite items I've purchased in the last year
customer_reviews.text: Really one of my favorite items I've purchased in the last year! We use this tens unit all the time. My wife thought it was a joke when I told her I was going to buy it, now I've got to fight her for it! Really though, it comes work 2 different cords so you can treat 2 areas or you & your wife can use it at the same time! This little thing can make your muscles really jump as much as the one in my chiropractors office. Really can't go wrong for the price either!
customer_reviews.author: Tim D

customer_reviews.title: Is not for us
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately for my husband it wasn't good enough, he is suffering horribly pain on his back so de machine doesn't really help for relief at least a lil bit, I guess we need something stronger than this.
customer_reviews.author: P. Medina

customer_reviews.title: Good for in-the-moment relief.
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I have musculoskeletal issues and this provides great in-the-moment relief although the pain does return shortly after use. You can use the pads more than once although they don't seem as effective. I dont regret my purchase because in-the-moment relief is appreciated and feels wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I tried the Aleve direct therapy electrolysis for a few days until I received this item in the mail, and I can say that it’s FAR better than the Aleve direct therapy. It’s a really great product for a really good price. I would recommend this to anyone who has back pain or even knee problem. It’s so easy to use and it WORKS! I’m completely satisfied by this produce
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I've bought myself in a long time
customer_reviews.text: I love my tens unit.... I have to constantly track down where in the house it is because we all love to use it
customer_reviews.author: msme

customer_reviews.title: Very effective at reducing pain
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Pure Enrichment TENS product for about a month. I purchased it after having some Physical Therapy treatments that used a TENS machine on my neck and shoulder. At the conclusion of my PT ... I used your product to continue treatment at home. To date, it has been very effective at reducing the pain in my back, shoulder, and arm. I found it easy to use and would recommend the product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Dana L. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Pure Pulse to use on my mid-back after pulling some muscles when overcompensating doing a lift at Crossfit. I had tried rolling out the area with a foam roller and a different massage tool. These weren't providing me the relief I needed. The PurePulse has been extremely helpful with loosening up the tight muscles. I like that there are the options for massage or kneading, along with the button to regulate the speed, and lastly the ability to adjust the strength of the electrodes.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa W

customer_reviews.title: Dandy product, although with a few glitches...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, does the trick, although on neither the unit I received, nor the replacement unit they kindly sent, did the 'repeat' button work. One of the two channels shorted out on me after about six months of infrequent use. Still using the one channel, and I quite like the product otherwise...I like the console, and it's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! It really works!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and it really works! Make sure you start on the low settings and build up in intensity so that you don't experience what the other customers are talking about with a "painful" massage... I think it helps a lot to release tension in my shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Relief
customer_reviews.text: Wish the intensity could go higher, but for what it it, IT'S GREAT!! RELIEF, RELIEF, RELIEF.
customer_reviews.author: Renee G.

customer_reviews.title: 👎
customer_reviews.text: Just a below average rating. It doesn't have the intensity that my pain needs. It was not very effective at all. Really disappointed. I bought an EMPI unit and that really works. This one was cheap compared to the EMPI.
customer_reviews.author: donelle m. ketchum

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! Excellent tens unit especially for the price. Years ago i got one from the chiropractors office and it was so hard to use. Plus the replacement pads my old one was $25 for 4. What! !!!! This one is easy with pre set controls or you can set and adjust manually. Very powerful also. I'm very happy with the purchase. Even comes with batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Pugs&Kisses

customer_reviews.title: Awesome massage and treatment
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to help ease the pain in my shoulders and neck. I have been using it for about a week now and am thrilled with the ease of use and performance. I have seen chiropractors and physical therapists and neither have helped the pain that I feel in my shoulders and neck. The PurePulse is very effective. The strength of the high frequency stimulation was surprising and delivered an awesome massage and treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Tingling Relief
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with product. I have been looking at different ones for a month or two after trying a relatives stimulator. Went with yours based on reviews and price. Very nice product for the value. My knee hasn't felt better. My wife is now using it on her shoulder. Thank you. Jeff M.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say, this thing is amazing!! After going to physical therapy & doing something very similar to this thing I decided to purchase on here. It relieves pain amazingly. I have plantar fasciitis/heel spurs and this helps tremendously with my feet. Do yourself a favor and buy this! :)
customer_reviews.author: Mhs97

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: After dealing with neck and shoulder pain and trying everything even shots, this has helped more then anything. I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for some type of relief from pain. Easy to use and shuts it self off when the time is up. Only wish it had some other type of storage container other than the box it came in.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J Reagle

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use and allows you to adjust the style ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product but it really works. I frequently have a sore neck and lower back and it helps a lot. My son also uses it and loves it. It's easy to use and allows you to adjust the style of massage, intensity and speed. There are some auto settings as well. Start out on a low setting when you first use it and then slowly work up.
customer_reviews.author: M. Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with this product. I deal with constant pain on my lower back and pain in my knees and ankles from my time with the U.S. Marine Corps. PurePulse tens unit helps me relax and recover from these pains and I have been using them every night since I purchased this product. I give this a 5 on a scale from 1-5 and would recommended to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product today and it is amazing on my back! It only came with 4 pads which I was told in the description but I thought it was not going to work so why would I order any more pads. Now I know it works very very well so I will be order more pads because this will be used daily. I might share it with my husband, LOL
customer_reviews.author: John A. Hammonds

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after few weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: Product was great for the first two weeks I had it. It then stopped working and changing batteries and moving cables around did nothing. I'm a huge tech guy and I can tell the thing is just a dud. Save your money and go for a more quality product, the positive reviews may be inaccurate or they may have just gotten lucky.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't very affective
customer_reviews.text: I used this product twice and found that the pad didn't adhere well, which caused sharp, and uncomfortable current. Spend more money and get a higher quality unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bargain on a TENS unit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a "Prospera" TENS unit, which I had dropped, and which cost considerably more than the "Pure Pulse" unit. It's EXACTLY the same, which is great, as the damaged "Prospera" unit lasted for 4-5 years and worked perfectly. I expect this replacement to do the same.
customer_reviews.author: charles corum

customer_reviews.title: Relief giver!
customer_reviews.text: The rating you wanted is from 1-5 but I would give it a 10. I instantly started feeling relief and i felt much better after the 15 min treatment, i didn't even need a high intensity. The instructions are clear and it's easy to use. It would've been nice if I had the option to use a power cord as well, not just batteries. It uses 4 triple A batteries
customer_reviews.author: geek_girl1

customer_reviews.title: Unit failed after only 3 months use
customer_reviews.text: The unit worked fine for its purpose, however it only lasted 3 months. For it to work, the screen must show a "P" and mine does not show it even after replacing batteries. If I were to start a return procedure it is very impractical for me because I do not live in US. 3 months of operation is too little, so I will have to replace it with another product and brand.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando R

customer_reviews.title: Instant relief..
customer_reviews.text: Just what the dr ordered....immediate relief..can take anywhere..ez to use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mister

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: Love the product it reminds me of physical therapy and it actually does help
customer_reviews.author: Casandra Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and effective
customer_reviews.text: Feels very similar to the muscle stim used in my chiropractor's office! I had it going for an hour last night and so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: D. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Worked great just didn't like the dial for power option
customer_reviews.text: Worked great just didn't like the dial for power option. Very easy to accidentally his the dial and got o full power... ouch.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Went through Physical therapy for my arthritis on neck. The effect was very close to what my PT used on me during therapy. As an additional use, I also have plantar fascitis and I found relief going through the SOLE mode of this machine. I would just recommend if they can have a clip or a way for me to bring this device around my waist then it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carrot27

customer_reviews.title: a good product, massages well.
customer_reviews.text: this is good product. works very well. as several reviews, memtioned it is more powerfull, but massages well at high number. at the same time the lower numbers are tolarable. i like the product. the product quality is not that great but the price is also very reasonable. i do not know the reliability yet. i just bought a few days ago.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my PurePulse and so far it works great, although I was expecting the remote to be a bit smaller. The 3 settings, massage, beat, and knead all feel distinctly different and the intensity selection from 1-10 is amazing. I can only compare the PurePulse with my experience at the chiropractic office where a similar machine is used with electrode pads. The PurePulse feels like the chiropractic machine and has really soothed my back pains and aches! The electrode pads provided are secure as well. Great buy through Amazon, and thanks Pure Enrichment for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tena

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, but not cheap
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, but not cheap. I've been visiting a chiro for months and get a similar muscle treatment to loosen up my back. This little unit works just as good as the doc's and I bought it for less than the cost of one visit to the clinic. It seems sturdy and well built. I've only had it for a short time, but it seems a good product. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with your product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with your product. I used it on bilateral Achilles and it's the only thing that's taken away my pain since my injury. I can't begin to tell you how your product had increased my quality of life. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Lightner

customer_reviews.title: It's very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I received my PurePulse Electronic Massager Portable, Handheld Tens Unit Muscle Stimulator for Pain Management on Sunday. It was something that I had been contemplating purchasing for a while to deal with pain from fibromyalgia. I used it as soon as it arrived and felt relief immediately. It's very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Julia E. Magness

product_meta.title: Pure Enrichment PurePulse TENS Electronic Pulse Stimulator Featuring Comprehensive LCD Screen with 6 Program Modes, 3 Massage Settings, and 2 Channels - Includes 4 AAA Batteries and 4 Electrode Pads
feature_bullets: 6 PROGRAM MODES: Pre-programmed for targeted areas: waist, shoulder, joint, hand, leg, and foot with a built-in treatment timer that shuts off automatically after 15 minutes of continuous treatment
3 MASSAGE TYPES: Choose from massage, beat, and knead settings to help ease muscle stiffness, soreness and chronic pain
2 CHANNEL MODES: Treat 2 different areas simultaneously using different pulse and speed settings
COMPREHENSIVE LCD SCREEN: Shows key treatment stats like treatment body part, treatment time remaining, program mode, and massage and speed settings

WHAT YOU GET: TENS electronic pulse stimulator, 2 lead connection cords, 4 electrode pads (1.5” x 1.5”), 4 AAA batteries, 2 Year Warranty, caring customer support, and the peace of mind that comes from a trusted brand with millions of customers worldwide

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
